alert.note: Alert for Gallatin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 4:58PM MDT until July 28 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Gallatin County in south central Montana... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 456 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 22 miles northwest of Clyde Park, or 27 miles north of Bozeman, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Maudlow and Menard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
